name: Figma File Covers For Teams
description:
A collection of Figma file cover templates best suited for teams. Features include:


  • Set file type (Figma or FigJam) and file status (Approved, In Progress or Pending) using variants.
  • Pack of 3 solid colored covers.
  • Pack of 3 soft gradient colored covers.
  • Light and dark modes available.
  • Designed with auto-layout.


-

Jello (@madewithjello)
